skillTree.localised_description: Fit, hardy, and raised on a diet of grains and human blood, this beast can outrun its Old World counterparts.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

skillTree.localised_description: A vast, mobile altar allows the souls of the slain to be ritualistically condemned directly from the field of slaughter.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

skillTree.localised_description: The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.
Although lacking the finesse of Elven magics, the sorceries of the north are no less potent, for they channel furious, Daemonic power.
Sheathed in sorcery and guarded against attacks, the Spirit Warrior summons deadly flame.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: This seer acts as the voice of the Four, delivering the will of the gods to the tribe.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve: +3 per turn

skillTree.localised_description: Years of service to the Raging Sky has elevated this shaman above the others, and the younger seers follow their elder’s guidance.

skillTree.localised_description: The Four have their sacred beasts, and a wise shaman will give them special care.

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Spread Corruption action: Chaos Undivided corruption is increased by an additional 1
Spread Corruption action: Chaos Undivided corruption is increased by an additional 2
Spread Corruption action: Chaos Undivided corruption is increased by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10

skillTree.localised_description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Agent Actions [HIDDEN]

ui_effects.localised_text: Requires line of sight to the target

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This one was born with a strange mark upon their body, a sign that the Raging Sky watches over them.
Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +25%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

effects.description: Magic item drop chance from battle: +15%

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
Well built, robust. Powerful.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description: Reinforcements supporting this army can have their arrival point adjusted by +500 metres without incurring any time penalty

backgroundSkills.localised_description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.

effects.description: Magic item drop chance from battle: +15%

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Behind every thought they have - and every deed - is shameless, full-blooded spite.
"Some folk call me vicious. I'll scoop out the eyes of any who utter it in my presence."
To cause another's suffering, to delight in their pain, to extend their agony according to your whim. That is power.
This one delights in galloping across the steppes, feeling the cold wind in their face and the thunder of hooves beneath them.

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "The Great Wolf howls amidst the thunder, his red lightning guiding my blade to fresh blood."

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "See this dung pile? Can you not see the Great Vulture's wisdom contained within?"

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases as the unit takes damage

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "The Great Eagle soars over all, spying out new pastures for the herds to roam."

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with Winds of Magic spent on the battlefield

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "The Great Serpent tells me of great riches to the south, just waiting to be taken."

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases by each enemy unit in range with leadership wavering or lower.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This one comes from the strange community of hunters that feast upon warped mutant flesh. This diet has had...unusual results.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).
Entities with this attribute ignore the effects of enemy contact effects such as  Poison

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This one likes to hunt using the raptors native to the cliffs and crags of the Eastern Steppes.

effects.description:
Bonus vs. Large: +5 for Chaos Vultures
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Oh, horrific wonder! Vile awe! Such hateful majesty!

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: A Chaos Familiar memorises spells on its master's behalf, constantly rehearsing for its big moment until it is called upon to share its arcane knowledge.

target_if: Not on or below a platform

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Those blessed by Chaos see not only what is before them, but also what lurks in shadow, hiding in the periphery.
